verbs.description: [ARG0: sacramento gun shop] [V: stirs] [ARG1: outrage] [ARGM-LOC: amid string of nationwide bombing attempts sacramento black rifle a citrus heights - based guns and ammunition store] made a controversial facebook post wednesday morning depicting a bomb nestled in a mailbox after a series of pipe bombs were sent to prominent democrats and news organizations across the country this week the gun shop accompanied the clip art mail bomb image with an emoji - laden caption imploring the reader to have a bomb day followed by a laughing face the post caught traction online eliciting over 100 reactions on facebook most commenters played along with many adding their own memes however some users on sacramento reddit sacramento black rifle sacramento gun senator elizabeth warren facebook elizabeth warren sacramento california
